name: Tourza
description: Tourza is a Bangladeshi travel agency website. User can book tours from this website. They can read and write blog about tourist spot.

name: D&H Fashions
description: D&H Fashions is an E-commerce website. It's a user friendly website. User can buy cloths from this website very easily.

name: Melody Masters
description: Melody Masters is a music instruments learning school's website. Here a student can enroll online courses and an instructor can post classes.
